title: Oversized cursor
content:
Since our studio switched to UTS for our font management I’ve been having to troubleshoot various issues. One that I haven’t figured out is this:

Some of our postscript fonts like Charlotte Sans and Figural Book (both Letraset) come in with a cursor that is way overextended in length. I’ve even opened Figural up in FontLab, but see nothing wrong there. This issue can become problematic when setting paragraphs of text. Any ideas what can cause this?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103114908im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Fig_Book_4511.png)
author: Stephen Rapp

comments.content:
I’ve also had this happen when working with certain postscript fonts in Illustrator-it’s annoying.  
I have no idea what causes it though.

p.s. My workplace licensed Montague Script last year and it’s a hit!
